name: Saban's Power Rangers Zeo: Battle Racers
description:
In this racing title based in the Zeo season of world-famous television series Power Rangers, players are allowed to select among the six Zeo Rangers (Pink, Yellow, Red, Blue, Green, Gold) or their enemies (King Mondo, Cog Soldier) to compete in a head-to-head circuit challenge along 16 race courses divided by 5 Tracks.

Each pilot has different attribute levels for Acceleration, Speed and Grip, providing a more balanced competition. Besides several obstacles and speed energizers scattered by the courses, players can attack opponents by firing Blasters (a la Super Mario Kart special items) at their adversaries; the limit is 5 Blasters per race except for Cog Soldier's infinite Blaster amount.

Along with 1-Player game modes (Race, Time Trial and VS CPU), the game also offers 2-Player split-screen gameplay through Race and 2P VS plus 3 alternative modalities: Point Race, where players must race over objects to earn points; Bumper Chase, with the main objective to ram the opponent off the course; and Blaster Master, a Life Energy-based deathmatch.

shot.caption: Title screen / Main menu.
Driver selection.
Choosing a course.
Course grid: about to start the running session, Yellow Ranger puts some RPM into her Dune Buggy...
While crosses a bridge, Pink Ranger starts to plan a strategy to win Gold Ranger's third position.
Located at an average distance, Cog Soldier fires a Blaster against his next target: Green Ranger...
Before to attempt a counterattack against Pink Ranger, it's time to Green Ranger avoid Cog Soldier!
Red Ranger shots a Blaster against Blue Ranger, while Zeo Ranger 2 (Yellow) tries to be the 3rd one!
Gold Ranger's counter-shot-attack in Zeo Ranger 1 (Pink) is accurately performed: too bad for her...
Handling his Hover Craft with expertise, Zeo Ranger 3 (Blue) was able to complete another curve...
After a successful attack in King Mondo, Pink Ranger accidentally loses her balance in a oil slick
Zeo Ranger 4 (Green) attempts to take Gold Ranger's 1st position, when a speed energizer is found...
After 5 laps in the slippery curves of Ice Sheet 1, King Mondo wins a match against the Gold Ranger!
Demonstration mode: the time where Cog Soldier shots a Blaster in direction to Zeo Ranger 3 (Blue).
Post-race (result) screen.
Zeo Ranger 5 (Red) uses a shortcut through the dark water, but judging by his low speed, it fails...
Even with Pink Ranger in his tail, Cog Soldier utilizes his Quadrafighter to perform a tight turn.
Gold Ranger peels out the grid: now, Yellow Ranger's Dune Buggy is about to crash Jet Cycle's back!
Grand Canyon 2 - Cog Soldier attempting to stay as far as possible of Green Ranger's action zone.
Pink Ranger attempts to reach the other competitors while crosses a zone with several speed ramps.
Meanwhile, Blue Ranger takes full advantage of a speed-boost ramp and gets more near of Red Ranger.
Unfortunately, Zeo Ranger 5 (Red) loses the balance and falls off the edge in Rangers Base 1 course.
Cog Soldier driving in reverse way? Probably he spinned out during a certain time, losing the route.
Zeo Ranger 2 (Yellow) spins out in the road after having passed over two pestering quicksand slicks.
Waiting that the Pink Ranger can be hit-stunned for some time, King Mondo fires a Blaster backwards.
Blue Ranger's Time Trial session - Suddenly, the Zeo Ranger 3 crashes into a tire-based protection.
Together with Zeo Ranger 4 (Green), Gold Ranger starts to domain the next curves in South Island 1!
King Mondo and Cog Soldier disputing to know who's the best in this challenge (2P Point Race mode)!
Both Green and Red Ranger collides quickly, but are ready to resume the bout (2P Bumper Chase mode).
Zeo Rangers 3 (Blue) and 1 (Pink) in a simultaneous Blaster-based attack (2P Blaster Master mode)...
